description: This file contains source code for a devtool plugin that manages deployment and undeployment of recipe output files in a build system. It provides command-line interfaces for deploying files to remote targets over SSH, including script preparation, file transfer, and execution logic, as well as handling undeployment. It includes functions for preparing remote shell scripts, deploying, undeploying, and registering commands within a larger command framework.

methods.name: _prepare_remote_script(deploy, verbose=False, dryrun=False, undeployall=False, nopreserve=False, nocheckspace=False)
methods.description: Generates a shell script for deployment or undeployment on the target device, handling file operations and optional dry run or preserve modes.

methods.name: deploy(args, config, basepath, workspace)
methods.description: Main function to handle deploying recipe files to a remote target via SSH, including preparation of file lists, script creation, transfer, and execution.

methods.name: undeploy(args, config, basepath, workspace)
methods.description: Main function to handle undeploying recipe files from a remote target via SSH, including script creation, transfer, and execution.

methods.name: register_commands(subparsers, context)
methods.description: Registers deploy and undeploy commands with command-line argument parsers.
